body_html: I have encountered from the same problem.Maybe the last irregular batch will use more memory(I don't know the reason).At last,I found that DataLoader has the option drop_last that can drop out the last irregular batch,I used it to solve the problem.

body: I have encountered from the same problem.Maybe the last irregular batch will use more memory(I don't know the reason).At last,I found that DataLoader has the option **drop_last** that can drop out the last irregular batch,I used it to solve  the problem.
